title: Belgian police raid EU Commission in real estate sale probe
summary_full: The EU executive said it was "aware of an ongoing investigation" into the sale of 23 commission buildings worth some €900 million
summary_public: The EU executive said it was "aware of an ongoing investigation" into the sale of 23 commission buildings worth some €900 million
